user_id.description: A unique identifier of the user in the organization.

membership_id.description: A unique identifier of the user in the workspace

is_active.description: A boolean value that identifies if a member is active an not blocked.

workspace.description: A name of the user's current active workspace.

workspace_name.description: A unique identifier of the user's current active workspace.

email_verified.description: A boolean value that identifies if the email is verified.

role.description: A member's role in the workspace.

user_license.description: A user license in the organization: Full (Standard); Read-only; eSignature; Guest; Creator.

date_created.description: A date when a member was added to the workspace.

date_modified.description: Last modified date of a member.
